concept.title: Move Views Aligned to Sheet_New update
concept.shortdesc: Move views placed on one sheet to another sheet in the model. Update here 123 Views moved are aligned in the same position on the target sheet.

conbody.p: Views placed on a sheet can be moved to another sheet in the model. Select a view and then right-click to move the view. When the view is moved, it is aligned to the same position on the target sheet. Select multiple views on a sheet to move more than one view at a time. Views placed on multiple sheets can be selected from the Project Browser and then moved to one target sheet.
When selecting a target sheet, use the search tool in the dialog to help locate the target sheet.
For additional information, see Move View Aligned to Sheet.
